__e: Well, great thanks to Colonel Young, who did an amazing job.
- and just get this over with? - I don't think Colonel Young is so far above reproach as you seem to think he is.
Colonel Young left you to die on purpose.
Perhaps you should ask the Colonel what really happened to my father.
Yes, colonel, what can i do for you?
And I told the colonel I didn't need your help.
He called up the Colonel and said:
I know what this looks like, Colonel, and I know what everyone is thinking.
- With all due respect, Colonel... I don't think we're there yet, but we do have a problem.
The colonel don't want the likes of me there.
- The Commander said to go with them.
Now, our colonel said he was the first one.
Or did Colonel Mustard do it alone?
I'm sure Colonel Mitchell will be very pleased to hear he's got more special alone time with the General.
I think it's pretty clear Colonel Mitchel doesn't have a couple of days.
I agree, but colonel Mitchell isn't here right now.
